ABOUT REDCLIFFE

Who we are and
how we work

How we are different

Cross-border focus

We have handled some of the most complex cross-border transactions involving Ukraine.

Fast growing

We have grown threefold and added a number of practice areas over the past three years, which makes us one of the most dynamic and fastest growing law firm in Ukraine.

Diversity

We employ US-, UK- and Ukraine- qualified lawyers, mailing us one of the most diverse law firm in Ukraine.

our reputation

Demonstrates know-how in various types of loans, project finance and trade finance across a broad range of industries.

mandates.
